desc: Driver Login - Has Restricted AccessClient Login - Has Restricted Access - Client such as FedEx can only see Drivers working for FedEx, for example they can see other drivers working for UPS.Admin Login - No RestrictionsLive GPS once Driver has logged inTimed Tracking of the days delivery run that can be generated as a PDF and sent via email as a report of days work.Admin & Clint can see deliveries onboard Driver 'live'Driver can check off delivery as its done and client can see the delivery is complete.App can scan deliveries at start of day, can the app either upload info to client or can client download delivery manifest to driver via APPThis above point would allow our clients to see what deliveries our drivers have on board and know when they are getting delivered.We currently use Esendex for Drivers to text in their times. Can the App send the drivers times to our Esendex virtual numberhe main thing we need that looks difficult is the ability of a smartphone to read the barcodes of carton labels of different companies like FedEx & UPS, only recording the label or connote number and address.Then can the APP have the ability to place that address on the phone for the driver to see, the client to see and for us to see.Once the driver is done the delivery, can the delivery be checked off? Can the time and GPS location be recordedAt the end of the day can the driver generate a 'digital run sheet' that records the days times & movements and be sent to the client and to us?Trying to incorporate these features:Drivers login and must stay logged in during delivery Run.Managers of companies can login to see Drivers that are working for there depots. Eg: FedEx manager can login to see what a driver we've sent to work at FedEx.Managers can only see Drivers working for their Depots.I would like to find a way for drivers to record the deliveries they have on. Maybe a feature called 'Run' or 'Daily Manifest'. Maybe they can photo-capture the label of each delivery or the connote.The above features are what I need the App to do for me to be able to sell this the companies I work for and future clients.It's main purpose is to provide a connection to managers of their deliveries when the book us - outside hire that dont have their scanners, thus not have 'live' info on the drivers daily run.I can track the Drivers run, I can see what deliveries they have done, what's left. It will help me improve effeciency and productivity.
title: Hire a Mobile App Developer

desc: The main target is to have remote desktop of the raspberry PI display on smartphone android and iphone.Main functions:The app is a simple xrdp client which works as remote desktop via wifi. The app basically lets connecting to another wifi device which is running like access point wifi with a xrdp server already running (as stand alone not sharing any internet connection )After opening the APP which is a single page , the user will be prompted with a main screen (layout will be provided)The user can select from the WiFi menu to hook to the desired ssid  and will be prompted for a password. Once selected the ssid and password then a connect button will be operative and  clicking on it the remote desktop will be started pointing to a default static ip and with a default name and password. Then the remote desktop will start automatically  showing the remote screen. The screen shall stay on not dimming over time as when you are watching something.The app will just have few buttons to disconnect reconnect etc.There are already similar app on the playstore i can show example just need to customise simple one.
title: Android iphone app xrdp client

desc: I have an idea to create a new type of Iphone case that has both a heating and cooling option on the case. My market would be anyone who is either cold or hot, when at the beach or when it's chilly outside, just flip the switch and hold the phone either in your hands or close to your face. I would like to pair this case with an app to turn on and regulate the temperature of the case. I feel like this can be a huge product and it can be licensed to bigger iphone brands or taken independently to make massive profits. The fan/heating system within the case would be through small vents and it would be safe enough that the phone does not overheat. Additionally, the vents would be very small and hidden within the actual design of the case. Imagine a personalized iPhone case with small vents to provide cooling and/or heating.
